hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity Recovery Momentum After News-Driven Drawdowns
hypothesis_content.statement: News-induced liquidity drawdowns (like Japan rate news) that reduce aggregate market depth by >25% see asymmetric recovery patterns: first 30% of liquidity recovery predicts 80% of subsequent price recovery within next 6 trading hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Post-October market structure shows liquidity returns before price during news shocks. Market makers reload books cautiously, creating predictable recovery sequence where early liquidity return signals subsequent price recovery.
entry_conditions: Aggregate crypto market depth drops >25% within 2 hours of news event
BTC price decline < liquidity decline (price/depth ratio <0.7)
First 30% of depth recovery occurs within 4 hours
Perpetual funding rates remain negative (indicating oversold)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price recovers 80% of news-induced decline OR 6 hours elapsed
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Liquidity recovery stalls <50% complete while price breaks new lows

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Liquidity recovery fails to predict price recovery in >30% of news-induced drawdowns
